title: Freeze Player Name Column on Add C Widget
custom_steps:
Allow users to still see the player names after horizontally scrolling all the way to the right. May also have to freeze the two columns to the left as well.

See attached:

title: As a BOC Admin, I don't want Clubs to be able to Option Players to an Out of Season Affiliate
custom_steps:
AC:

* On submit of an optional assignment, the system will perform a rule check to see if the To Club is in season
* If the affiliate season has ended, the system will return a blocking message for Club users and an overridable warning for BOC
** Title:
*** Error/Warning
** Body:
*** A Player may only be optioned to an affiliate club during that clubâ€™s season.
** Buttons: 
*** Back (for Clubs)
*** Ignore & Continue (for BOC)
*** Cancel (for BOC)
* If all of the organization's affiliates of have ended their season's, the player may only be optioned to the Complex League
** There is currently a rule that states â€œ"A Player may only be optioned to a rookie club during that clubâ€™s season."â€œ  This rule should be updated to: "A Player may only be optioned to a rookie club during that club's season, or if all other affiliates' seasons have ended."

title: For Employee Permission Requests, Allow for Extensions for a Total of 14 Days
custom_steps:
Context: Currently, users cannot request an extension on an Employee Permission Request for more than 7 days at a time. However, rules allow them to extend for up to a total of 14 days. This means that after 7 days, users have to go back into the system to request 7 more days to get the full amount of days allotted to them for an extension.

AC:

* Allow users to request extensions for up to a total number of 14 days
** Allow users to request 14 days all at once OR
** If a user requests an extension of a certain number of days under the 14 day limit, allow them to go back into the system and request whatever number of days puts them at a *total* for 14 days
*** Ex: a user requests an extension of 3 days, then they can go back in and request up to 11 days

title: Hide Employee "Contracts" tab on EBIS for Club Users
custom_steps:
Context: There has been some confusion from the Clubs between the Employee Rosters tab and the Employee Contracts tab. After this year, Employee Contracts will be out of date. 

AC:

* Remove the â€œContactsâ€� tab on the Employees dashboard for Club Users view.
* Club users should continue to be able to access individual employees' contract history

title: MJC Printing - Create and deploy screenshots service for MJC
custom_steps: Move MJC printing to screenshot services

title: As a MNC Admin, I want to be able to edit the end date for an AFL assignment on the MN Payroll Utility
custom_steps:
AC:

* AFL report dates will be visible on the Update Date modals on the MN Payroll Utility
* AFL report dates will not be editable to any users
* AFL End Dates will be editable to both Club and BOC admin users

title: As a BOC, I do not want players who are added to a MJ Roster and Optioned on the same day to get service unless the post-game option is selected
custom_steps:
AC:

* Beginning in 2025, players who are selected to a ML roster or signed to a ML roster and optioned on the same day, should NOT get a day of MLS, unless the post-game option checkbox is checked
* If a player meeting this criteria has the post-game option checked, they will be given a day of MLS

title: Assign Pro Player Club Viewer on Account Approval
custom_steps: When a new user is approved through Self-Reg and assigned an Org, they should automatically be given Pro Player Club Viewer along with EBIS-User

title: Update EBIS login Okta hosted page to not rely on Okta widget
custom_steps: This will get us in a place to fix the end user double logon issue as we would be enabled to move away from using the Okta widget.  Trusted auth will generate a log in token and create a dedicated path between application and platform without the need to restructure our permissioning structure.

title: Convert Capitalized Payments report to screenshots
custom_steps:
as per [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-719|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-719|smart-link]  we need to convert the report out of CDATA.  

Capitalized payments should now run via screenshots and not through business objects

title: Convert the Major Contract Award Bonus Packages widget to react
Convert Player Tracking tab to React
custom_steps: Player Tracking page needs to be updated to React, all features should work the same on ebisui and ebisapp.

title: Prevent BData from receiving picks on API during Prod mocks
custom_steps:
There are times when we want to run a mock draft in Production after the BData team has turned their listener on, so we donâ€™t want them to see picks on the API, but we/BOC do want to see the picks.  BDataâ€™s user account is in the â€œUnassignedâ€� org but this org still sees all Production picks on the API, whether in mock mode or not.  We need to decide how we want to address this.

We will add a new RULE4-MOCK-API-VIEWER permission which will be checked for all picks going out when a mock is running.  Permission will not be a part of any role and will need to be manually added to anyone who needs it (and will not be granted to anyone to start)

title: As a CEP Player, I want to be able to see my Usage on the Portal
custom_steps:
Desktop Wireframe: [https://app.zeplin.io/project/66312a0a2639c9bdc8c382c4/screen/66392852c04c6aaa4ff5f9df|https://app.zeplin.io/project/66312a0a2639c9bdc8c382c4/screen/66392852c04c6aaa4ff5f9df|smart-link] 

Mobile Wireframe: [https://app.zeplin.io/project/66312a0a2639c9bdc8c382c4/screen/66392856764e2ccb5509ef5a|https://app.zeplin.io/project/66312a0a2639c9bdc8c382c4/screen/66392856764e2ccb5509ef5a|smart-link] 

AC:

* There will be a collapsable section labeled â€œYour Usageâ€�
* Expanding this section will reveal three tabs:
** Commitment
** Used
** Remaining
* The default will be to show the screen on the â€œCommitmentâ€� tab
* The system should pull from EBIS to fill in the relevant dollar amounts
* The Commitment, Used, and Remaining tables will have the following columns:
** Tuition Allowance
** Living Allowance
* The Commitment table will have the following rows:
** Semesters
** Per Semester
** Questers
** Per Quarter
** Total Commitment
** Total IPB Offset
** 10 Year Expiration
* The Used table will have the following rows:
** Semesters
** Amount
** Quarters
** Amount
** Total Amount Used
* The Remaining table will have the following rows:
** Semesters
** Per Semester
** Quarters
** Per Quarter
** Estimated Balance
* The portal should be linked to playerâ€™s CEP/CSP EBIS statuses to populate accurate data

title: Convert Drug Test Requests reg tab to React
custom_steps:
Drug Test Requests page needs to be updated to React, all features should work the same on ebisui and ebisapp.



During the conversion, can we add a Header Filter for Request Date, similar to the Reg Admin?

From date would default to Jan 1 of the current year

To date would default to current date.

title: As a BOC User, I want to send a player memo via Text
custom_steps:
AC:
 - When a player memo is sent, EBIS will send the memo to all players via Text using the MLB Official Contact Info
 - Deliveries and failures will be logged and available for download
